akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibited acts relating to complementary access

akn:content.akn:p: § 8124. Prohibited acts relating to complementary access It shall be unlawful for any person willfully to fail or refuse to permit, or to disrupt, delay, or otherwise impede, a complementary access authorized by this subchapter or an entry in connection with such access. (Pub. L. 109–401, title II, § 224, Dec. 18, 2006, 120 Stat. 2747.)
